title: Uchuu Show e Youkoso (Welcome to THE SPACE SHOW)
synopsis: Five elementary school children are spending their summer break camping at a remote mountain village. While on a hunt for their missing rabbit, Pyon-kichi, they find an injured dog in a field with crop circles. After nursing the dog back to health, they are shocked when he suddenly speaks and introduces himself as Pochi Rickmanâ€”an alien researcher who has been on Earth researching its plant life.
